item.title: Credit Agricole to Pay About €88 Million to Settle Tax Scheme Probe
item.description: Credit Agricole SA’s investment banking arm agreed to pay about €88 million ($103 million) to settle a French criminal probe into allegations the lender carried out trades designed to escape taxes on
